column4: Hello, I am buying a new pc with an nVidia 7200GS 128MB.  Is that enough?  With os virtualization or gaming?
your graphics card has pretty much nothing to do with os virtualization
did not think so, but I was not sure with Win.  I just want to be prepared for gaming, 3d, and 3d compiz.
yeh, you can install the gnome desktop packages
